promotion_content: 4K X brings superspeed game capture to next-gen players. With high-resolution, high frame rate passthrough and capture, it's our most powerful USB capture card ever. still, it set up in a snap and gets out of your way. you won't even know it's there.

features.title: HDMI 2.1
features.desc: Higher resolution, higher frame rates, like 4K144 or 1080p240

features.title: Plug & Play
features.desc: Windows, Mac, and iPad* HDMI 2.1 and USB-C cables included

features.title: Variable Refresh Rate
features.desc: Zero ghosting, stuttering, or screen tearing
